meeting_request.purpose: Need help improving my writing and presentation skills
meeting_request.description: Hi, I'm Chad, a second-year Writing Studies major. I’ve been doing well academically, but I’m finding it harder than usual to write effectively, especially in my writing-intensive courses. Last semester, I took a writing seminar and a research paper, and both were really difficult. I spent hours drafting papers, but then I would get stuck on the same structure or analysis, and I would end up with a mess of a draft. This semester, I’m taking a writing seminar and a research paper again, and I’m already behind on my work. I know I need to improve, but I find writing and presentation difficult even when I know what I’m doing. I’m not sure how to get better, so I’m reaching out to talk about strategies. I want to work with a tutor or mentor to work on a writing plan, practice writing in different contexts, and learn how to present my work effectively.
